author: djrtwo
content:
Welcome to the Eth R&D discord! We're excited you are participating as an eth2 validator :)
This server is dedicated to the discussion of Layer 1 Ethereum research and development.
So to not clutter that conversation, we kindly ask you to take validator support questions to more focussed forums.

Our friends at ethstaker are building a community resource for general validator discussion and support at https://invite.gg/ethstaker. Check it out, ask some questions, and be sure to contribute back once you get your feet under you

In addition to the ethstaker server, clients also maintain their own discords for discussion and support. Check out the following client-specific servers:
* Lighthouse -- https://discord.gg/cyAszAh
* Lodestar -- https://discord.gg/aMxzVcr
* Nimbus -- https://discord.gg/XRxWahP
* Prysm -- https://discord.gg/KSA7rPr
* Teku -- https://discord.gg/7hPv2T6


Thank you! and enjoy validating <:eth2:595693639913570305>
